name: 陳柔妃
objective: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real-world data.
schedule:
1 Introduction to the Program	
2 Introduction to Geographic Information Systems	
3 Characteristics of Geographic Information	
4 Patterns of Geographic Data 	
5 Database Structure	
6 Spatial Data Architecture	
7 Geographic Data Collection	
8 Geographic Data Processing		
9 Mid-term Test		
10 Metadata Creation and Processing		
11 Geographic Data Analysis		
12 Analysis and Processing of Spatial Data		
13 Integration of Spatial and Metadata Analysis and Processing		
14 Presentation of Geographic Data		
15 Geographic Data Visualization		
16 Map Themes and Components		
17 GIS Application Examples		
18 Final exam
scorePolicy: Midterm exam 20%; Final exam 20%; Regular Homework 60
materials: 1. Basudeb Bhatta (2021), Remote Sensing and GIS,  OUP India 3rd edition, 752 pages, ISBN-10:  0199496641.
consultation: Teacher's Office Room 508-1; teaching assistant Room 204-3. During the first week of the semester, all students are invited to join the group of instant messaging software (Line).
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG13：氣候行動（Climate Action）
